dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here's a summary of your tarot reading activities.

appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.description: Manage all your client appointments in one place.

schedule.title: Schedule a New Appointment
schedule.step1_desc: Select a client for the appointment.
schedule.step2_desc: Choose one or more services for this session.
schedule.step3_desc: Pick a date and time for the appointment.
schedule.summary_desc: Review the details before confirming the appointment.
schedule.success_toast_desc: Appointment for {{name}} on {{date}} has been booked.

customers.title: Customers
customers.description: View and manage your client roster.

add.title: Add New Customer
add.description: Enter the details for the new customer.
add.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
add.success_toast_desc: The new customer has been added successfully.

reading.title: New AI Reading
reading.description: Start a new tarot reading session powered by AI.
reading.spreadDescription: The cards representing past, present, and future.
reading.loadingMessage: The spirits are whispering... generating your interpretation.

toast.missingInfoDesc: Please select a client and draw cards first.
toast.failedDesc: The spirits are quiet right now. Please try again later.

services.title: Services
services.pageDescription: A list of all tarot reading services offered.

pricing.title: Pricing List
pricing.description: Reference for tarot service pricing in Indonesia.
pricing.table_description: General price range based on market rates as of July 2025.

factors.experience: Experience: More well-known or experienced readers may have higher rates.
factors.media: Consultation Media: Offline (face-to-face) readings are usually more expensive.
factors.complexity: Number of Questions/Spreads: The more complex, the higher the price.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.description: Manage your public tarot reader profile.

specializations.title: Service Specializations
specializations.description: Manage the types of readings you offer.

durations.title: Session Durations
durations.description: Manage the available session durations and their pricing.

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.description: Enable or disable payment methods for your clients.
